member.name: MF_TOPONODE_DRAIN_MODE
member.summary: Defines at what times a transform in a topology is drained.

member.name: MF_TOPONODE_DRAIN_MODE.MF_TOPONODE_DRAIN_DEFAULT
member.summary: The transform is drained when the end of a stream is reached. It is not drained when markout is reached at the end of a segment.

member.name: MF_TOPONODE_DRAIN_MODE.MF_TOPONODE_DRAIN_ALWAYS
member.summary: The transform is drained whenever a topology ends.
